website_summaries.verdict: A higher end dry shampoo featuring Moroccan Argan Oil that promotes shine for all hair types.
pros: Adds volume and shine to hair, smells wonderful, and can keep the scalp oil-free for up to 2 days
A little goes a long way and it blends in easily
cons: Higher price than other products and some find the scent too strong

customer_reviews.title: I love this dry shampoo - and I have tried every ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry shampoo - and I have tried every one out there. The spray has a light powder in it, and it actually does absorb any oil at your roots that are the result of only shampooing every other day or two. It's not heavy at all, brushes through beautifully, doesn't build up or show as having anything on your hair and smells wonderful. I buy two at a time so I don't ever run out.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: This is my absolute favorite. Most of them smell awful
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many, many dry shampoos over the years. This is my absolute favorite. Most of them smell awful. This smells amazing and doesn't leave my hair feeling funky like some of the other dry shampoos do.
customer_reviews.author: M.Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic Moroccan oil smell. Does not seem to keep my hair as refreshed as the Living Proof dry shampoo, but I like the smell much more. My husband hates strong smells and used to complain after I used the Living Proof dry shampoo, no peep with this one though! I do love dry shampoo to save my fine hair from daily washings. I can get away with using this and putting my hair up the second day. I have not noticed any white streaks either as I used to occasionally notice with the Living Proof. The Moroccan oil appears to have a slightly purple tint to combat brassiness.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough great things about this product! I have blonde hair so I obviously use the light tones one. It does not leave any white residue or weird feeling. I have used other dry shampoos that leave a weird texture in my hair and my hair ends up getting greasy throughout the day anyway but NOT WITH THIS ONE. Everyone says my hair smells great (unlike other dry shampoos that smell like baby powder - yuck!). The price is also not bad. This product is sometimes hard to find in stores and its just easier to order from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Better out there
customer_reviews.text: Not my fave. I saw all these glowing reviews and bought it. And for the price... nah. It does leave a white cast that I didn’t think I’d mind cause you brush that out anyway but for this price i just wasn’t wowed. I’m not someone who loves baltise (?spelling ) like a lot of people so I don’t know how it may work for you but I know my best results have come from the Pantiene Gold series ( discontinues of course ) and fantastic Sams ( also discontinued ) in the white bottle. I didn’t think these worked until I tried those two. Still on the hunt. And for ref I have blonde hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ally

customer_reviews.title: Ok packaging arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: As shown in photo arrived cracked so when I went to spray it broke off. This is the second time this happened with this brand. They don’t have a return policy so I recommend purchasing at a salon so you can return if purchased broken. Other than the packaging this is good. It’s light weight and smells good. It’s perfect in between showers. I have blond hair and it make my hair less greasy looking
customer_reviews.author: Conor Herron

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because I have never had success with dry shampoos. This not only works very well, but it also lasts so much, that I can get away with two days per spray on treatment, and I can also respray for another day of great looking hair.
customer_reviews.author: sodamom

customer_reviews.title: My wife’s in love
customer_reviews.text: Can we just get a life time supplie please. My wife uses it in her hair everyday. Tired of spending 26 dollars every time. I order this to often. She’s in love with this product
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Hands down Best dry shampoo ever. I have tried drug store brands other high end brands and this is the only one that I can genuinely say I love. It smells so good. If you use too much it can make your hair look to dry so it’s best to use a little at a time so you can avoid spraying to much, and as long as you don’t over spray it will make your hair look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. I use it almost every day, only washing my hair every 3-4 days. It doesn’t feel stiff or powdery. A little goes a long way and the smell is AMAZING. I will never use another brand... I just wish it was a little cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: cristinap

customer_reviews.title: My morning must-have.
customer_reviews.text: The slight violet tint does help keep my bleached blonde color cool in between purple shampoos. The smell is amazing. Makes my hair feel clean and soft with just the right amount of *grit.*. I expected that, but there’s a bonus for my fine, longer-on-tip slightly undercut pixie: this is a great styling product. It’s better for my hair than jarred “texturizers” that weigh my hair down instead of lifting it up. Better than spray wax. Better than “quick dry” (really???) texturizing sprays. Most mornings I use this and a little hairspray and I’m good to go. Yes, it’s a crazy price for dry shampoo, but I’m hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: This gives good body and minimal white residue, which are great attributes and I love, but I don't particularly like the scent, or lack of scent. It doesn't have the "refreshed" scent a lot of other dry shampoos have. I don't expect a strong smell, but mid-day, I could smell my hair sitting at my desk and it pretty much just smelled like I hadn't washed my hair in 5 days. Which, I had only gone 1 day of no wet shampoo. But, the look and feel of my hair might outweigh the scent, so I'd probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: megavere

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but I’m not coming back for more
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it and deemed it worth the higher price point but now that I’ve committed to the larger bottle I’m not sure. The fragrance does not stick around. It weighs my hair down, makes it dull looking and makes the ends of my hair kinda clump together. By midday I’m wishing I would have just washed my hair. It’s ok for those days when you’re running behind or just a lazy day but other brands at cheaper price points have the same results. I probably won’t splurge on this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Can Stop Searching. This is The Perfect Dry Shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I am OBSESSED with this dry shampoo. It's lightweight but powerfully absorbent, with that awesome Moroccan oil scent that makes you want to sniff your hair all day while your co-workers look at you like you're nuts. Seriously, try to stop smelling it. I dare you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J. Yarnell

customer_reviews.title: Can't use this product
customer_reviews.text: The amount of pressure required to push the button on the nozzle to activate is more than I can exert. So I have spent $26 on an unusable (for me) product. If I could, I would return this. Barring that, If I could I would give 0 stars. Not recommended for anyone with arthritic hands or fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo for blonde and silver hair
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best dry shampoo I have ever used. I have tried clean freak, dove and batista, And this stuff out performs all of them. I was hesitant because of the price but I'm glad I tried it. It does exactly what it's supposed to do and has a great smell as well. I'm throwing rest of the bottles away and having this sent to me monthly. I think you should try it and I bet you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N Sully N Keela

customer_reviews.title: Cap broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product when I started using it on my hair, but by the end of my first use, the spray cap had broken off. Usually if this happens, you can set it or click it back on, but not with this. I've been unable to fix it, and therefore unable to use it. No return policy, so a complete waste of money. I have a full bottle of unusable expensive dry shampoo. My advice - Save yourself a bunch of money. Go buy Garnier Fructis invisible dry shampoo instead. The coconut smells amazing. Works just as well except it's WAY cheaper and I've never had to deal with broken spray containers or wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: BEST dry shampoo I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is freaking amazing. It smells good, goes on nicely and really is suitable for a blonde! It sprays out slightly violet toned (for blondes) to balance out any brassiness you may have from being unwashed or just need a trip to the salon. Also orb sky my favorite about it, it doesn’t give your hair a rough texture meaning it leaves it clean feeling not ratty or anything! Big deal for me as I already have thick horse feeling hair lol! BEST dry shampoo I’ve ever used so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leigh Kolath

customer_reviews.title: I heard that dry shampoo gives your hair texture, ...
customer_reviews.text: I heard that dry shampoo gives your hair texture, and it does! Lift hair up by sections so you can spray underneath, especially the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Smell and No Powdery Residue
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product off and on for a couple of weeks and really like it. My favorite aspect is that it doesn’t get chalky, dry and flaky throughout the day. The smell is very pleasant as well. I have tried other dry shampoos such as Dove and Baptiste. I prefer this one despite the higher price point because it doesn’t seem to get powdery.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Two

customer_reviews.title: The Only Dry Shampoo You Need!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo on the market. First off, the scent is not floral. It just smells CLEAN and fresh. Secondly, after spraying and brushing my hair, it does not leave flaky white pieces in my hair. Thirdly, it keeps down flyaways without making my hair greasy. A little goes a long way as well, so the price per ounce is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Love how my hair feels after using it
customer_reviews.text: This is now my FAVORITE dry shampoo!!! No icky build up and doesn’t make your hair feel coarse. Love the scent l! Don’t notice much difference as far as lightening up my blonde hair but I sprayed some in my hand and noticed it does have a light purple tint to it so I’m sure it’ll help. Update: After using it a few times I got the hang of it. It actually covers my dark roots!!! This stuff is magical!!!! 5 stars ⭐️ for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: RyanMomof3

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for between-shampoo cleaning. Hard to believe that something dry that is sprayed into hair can do such a good job, but it does. If my hair starts getting a little oily, or if I've been in a stinky environment (smoke, cooking odors, wearing a hat on a hot, humid day, etc), Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo will clean, freshen, and soften my hair in a few minutes. I use the Dry Shampoo for Light Tones, so I can't comment on the Dark Tones product. I would guess it works as well, but I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Zero value, Can does not spray, can’t find a way to return
customer_reviews.text: This product does not dispense; the spray button seems to be defective. I cannot return it as it is an aerosol, and the Help Line is closed these days. A number of customers seem to have had this problem. I would appreciate some help with this problem from Amazon, as it is far too expensive a product to merely discard.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth s.

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOR BLONDES!
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite dry shampoo. Not only is it a perfect dry shampoo with being moisturizing while still doing it’s job. IT COVERS ROOTS!! (Well lightens them to blend at least) the ever so slight purple tint is a lifesaver between salon visits.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki LBK

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me and My Hair!
customer_reviews.text: After one tiny spritz of this product into my hair, I knew it could not possibly be for me! The aroma alone is terrible - sweet and strong! It has a lavender cast and immediately turned my hair dull and blue-white! My hair is natural silver, btw. Awful! I wanted to return this, but was informed by Amazon that it is not returnable! $26.00 down the drain...
customer_reviews.author: MrsJ

customer_reviews.title: Is This a Joke?
customer_reviews.text: I can't even rate this product with 1/2 a star but apparently I have to in order to submit my review. I've bought this product many times before in a salon. I don't have a salon close to me that carries this product so I thought I would order it off of Amazon. I have no idea what I was sold...the bottle looks the exact same, but nothing but cold air and a little bit of water come out of the can. So disappointed...this product should NOT be bought on Amazon. I will be sending the product back and asking for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Colie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair MORE greasy :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dry shampoo based on the great reviews for a hospital stay, knowing I would not be able to wash my hair (at least not regularly) while there. This product weighed my hair down and made it look far more greasy than it already did. I also felt it smelled way too strong. It was a waste of money for me!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEE
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I have ever purchased. The only thing that I can say I don't like is having to pay 26$ for a regular sized can. But SO WORTH IT. It gives good texture to your hair, doesn't leave cakey white dust, and gets rid of all the oil in your hair without having to use half the can. Just a little spray goes a long way. I'm blonde and I have struggled for years finding the perfect dry shampoo. Went through many, and I mean MANY brands. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Kay.ziak

customer_reviews.title: Strong, stinky smell!
customer_reviews.text: If your goals is to, after walking into the room, have people wrinkle their noses and exclaim “What is that smell!”—Well then, this is the product for you! Terrible, strong smell. My hair also didn’t look clean after applying it. I’m not sure what people see (or smell) in it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It really does work well! I have thin hair so I love the volume it gives me... you would never know I did not wash my hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: donnamarie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, but it is heavily fragranced
customer_reviews.text: Great dry shampoo that actually works really well. It's definitely my favorite, the only downside is the strength/amount of fragrance. It's not a bad scent it's just SO strong & it takes a long time for the scent to dissipate. I wish they would make a fragrance free version of this. It's also pretty pricey for a dry shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: HLU777

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. I have super thin hair so if I was it too frequently it gets very oily. With this product I can go over a week without washing my hair if I wanted to. The smell is so good I want to use it as a body spray. I’ve tried other dry shampoos and they leave a residue you can see. This product completely dissolves once you run a brush through your hair. Will continue to buy this product for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Concerts make me happy

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde hair and have tried many dry shampoos over the years.. drug store and high end. I like to wash my hair every 3-4 days, so was always trying new products. I never really liked any dry shampoos I tried because they always a) made my hair feel even dirtier b) smelled bad. This is one of the best I have tried and it smells amazing! I love to spray a little extra and use as a perfume :)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product sprays white powder on your hair and makes it look dull and lifeless. After spraying, my bathroom looked like a fog machine had gone off. I can’t believe it’d be good to breathe this stuff. I’ll be discarding it. Expensive lesson. I’ve liked other Moroccan Oil products but this one misses the mark - by a mile...
customer_reviews.author: Calif99

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have hated every single dry shampoo I have tried. Then I was told about this. WOW! This is amazing. I'm telling all of the friends about it. Smells great, easy to use, and I can get a full extra day without having to wash my hair.
customer_reviews.author: B. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, heavy blonde hair that gets grease pretty quickly. I've tried so many different types of dry shampoo, but most just make my hair feel heavier and don't really blend in. This dry shampoo actually absorbs all the oil and it really looks like I cleaned my hair that day. I used to wash my hair 5-6x a week. Now I shampoo 2-3 times a week, and use the dry shampoo almost every day in between. It also smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Liza A

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect for platinum blondes
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, not at all flakey. I spray it on, wait a few minutes, then gently touch it to blend it into my hair. It's VERY light (almost violet white), but perfect for super high tones.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit pricey, but so worth it. It helps highlight natural tones, doesn't leave a film and feels natural. Even gives my hair a little bounce back on the second day. I try to only wash my hair every other day and this really helps in between.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia J. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my fine blond hair
customer_reviews.text: I had never used dry shampoo before but this one was recommended by my hair stylist. At first the scent seems strong but it dissipates quickly. It is easy to use and gives my fine blond hair some volume. I will buy again and wish I'd known about this product earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: The best dry shampoo for blonds!
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo makes your hair feel full and naturally dry, hair is soft and with full body, I have lots of hair but thin this shampoo gives me the volume like nothing else, the added bonus for blonds - it refreshes the blond color, covers the roots, it makes my hair lighter giving it the "white-ash" tone. So addicting. Absolutely love it, can't live without this shampoo, simply the best! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a great dry shampoo and I’ve finally found the one! I made sure to read all the reviews before purchasing. They were not wrong. I have super oily hair, as in I’ll take a shower the might before and the next morning the hair around my face is already oily. I sprayed a little amount and my hair feels refreshed, not heavy or sticky like other dry shampoos. It instantly lightens my roots and makes my blonde look amazing. The scent is okay, not my favorite but the product is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo on market.
customer_reviews.text: Best dry shampoo there is. I won't use anything else and have tried pillow dry by redkin and several other salon grade products.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: I won’t use any thing else!
customer_reviews.text: I was a batiste dry shampoo for ever but this blew it out of the water. With the batiste, my hair was dull and flat once I used it in my hair. Definitely not the case with the Moroccan oil dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: C Mae

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo you can buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite dry shampoo and I have tried them all!! I have the oily hair like no other and if I don’t wash it every day it looks like I poured bacon grease on my scalp. This actually has saved me from the wash and dry every day ritual
customer_reviews.author: April Hipsher Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Small package but works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dry shampoo and I've tried a lot. The product was backordered but came when indicated, and packaged nicely. The fragrance is lovely, it works when you follow directions. Mine is lasting as I use it sparingly, but overall very small amount for the cost. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I have very light blonde hair and it was amazing. I haven't ever liked a dry shampoo before
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have been searching for a dry shampoo forever and I bought this. I thought it was expensive but gave it a shot. I have very light blonde hair and it was amazing. I haven't ever liked a dry shampoo before. It actually takes the oil out of my hair and makes it look fresh. I love the smell too
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: This is the only dry shampoo I will ever buy again
customer_reviews.text: I work at a hair salon and this is the only dry shampoo I recommend to blondes to keep brassiness away. It really gives volume and takes the grease right away. I am embarrassed to admit the last time I had to wash my hair due to this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing and keeps my hair looking clean for way longer than I’m willing to admit. I have short, straight, light brown hair. The product does kind of dull the natural luster of my hair, but that’s to be expected with dry shampoo. Altogether 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Len King

customer_reviews.title: I don't know
customer_reviews.text: The can is small as promised. It kept falling over onto the floor. I am too old to worry about dye in my hair. All in all, it is easier to wash my hair. As far as taking it back to Kohls, I don't have time to help Amazon join or take over Kohls.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Spray mechanism is defective-it won't spray-and there's a 'no return" policy on aerosols.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and loved it--best dry shampoo on the market. I ordered it on Amazon for convenience but when I tried to use it for the first time, it won't spray. I tried it several times with the same result. What a learned is that Amazon has a "No Return" policy on aerosol products. That's $26 down the drain. When I thought about it I can understand the no return policy but I wish I had known before. After this, I will buy aerosol products only where I can return them if they are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Works well on medium to dark blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Once rubbed in well you can’t tell anything has been added to your hair. A little expensive considering how much I use but worth it since I don’t have to wash and condition my hair everyday
customer_reviews.author: JLuttrull

customer_reviews.title: Really like
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dry shampoo - it doesn’t leave me with the white halo of other brands. Sometimes I use it just for a little def texture to curl clean hair too
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Very effective,  no sticky feel
customer_reviews.text: Best dry shampoo ever. No sticky feel. I use it at night, spraying it onto the roots in sections and then rubbing it into my scalp like you would with shampoo. Brush it out, and it helps to absorb oil overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie 52

customer_reviews.title: More than I’d like to spend but I find it worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but it’s my favorite. It prolongs the fresh look of my hair when I blow it out without the buildup. I love the scent of Moroccan Oil products. This is the same but smell but it’s very subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fake!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is a dupe! I bought the same dry shampoo from the website and loved it, but this one had an over-sweet smell and doesn’t seem to be doing anything for my hair
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It won't be my go to. I've used cheaper that surpass it's quality. I read all the reviews before buying and it didn't cause me to get that excited...I was disappointed to spend that much and not be wowed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair looking freshly washed!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product! Use as instructed and it keeps hair looking great! Adds bounce, shine, & texture without being thick or oily. You don’t need to use a lot for it to be effective. It is a large bottle so it may not be great for travel if you are looking for a compact bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Clark

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ‘okay’
customer_reviews.text: This is a good dry shampoo, smells great- but realistically it’s no better than any drugstore bottle for $4. Definitely won’t purchase again- the price is not good for value.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Faulty bottle or what?
customer_reviews.text: I am so bummed out about this bottle of dry shampoo. The last bottle I purchased worked extremely well. This one seems to be a lemon. There's literally NO white "powder" or dry shampoo product coming out of the spray can. It makes my hair look wet and greasy when I use it. I have used dry shampoo for years so I can confidently say there's something wrong with this product. I'm hopeful it is a fluke, but I'll likely be buying my dry shampoo from another company in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney M.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed! I’ve tried many different types of dry shampoo and this one is my absolute favorite! It doesn’t leave a weird texture to my hair and lasts all day. I like that I can use this when my hair is just a little shiny or when I’m on day 6 of not shampooing my hair. I’ve used their shampoo and conditioner and the smell is out of this word amazing. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel size
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the Moroccan Oil dry shampoo a few months ago and love the scent and it does a great job. Some times I can get 2 days with one application before I have to wash my hair. I ordered the travel size for short trips. I was willing to pay the price for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I need a dry shampoo that actually works, that doesn't leave a powdery mess behind, and it's an extra plus if it smells good. Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo is great on every point, so it's worth it to me even if a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Gemlovr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Will forever use this product!!! My boyfriend of all people found this at his stylist's shop and I've been using it for the past few years ever since. I was able to go a little over a week without actually washing my hair. No smell, no flakes, Makes my hair feel light and fresh. If you didn't know, now you do. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kyzer

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone with very thin, oily hair, this product works miracles. I can go days without washing my hair and this dry shampoo has it looking just as good as a first day of washing!! Amazing scent too and I love that they have light/dark tone options. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Myah Enroth

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best dry shampoos I've ever used. A coworker told me to try it and now I'm hooked. Just wish it cost a little less. My husband loves the scent - he always asks what I did different with my hair whenever I use it. Like how it comes for light tones too - can't see powder at all. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a pro
customer_reviews.text: As a blond with thin hair I had to shampoo daily. It is bad for your hair for sure, but my hair looked limp and greasy. Now after I discovered this product I have to shampoo once a week. My hair look thicker and curls stay in better. Lift your hair away from your scalp and spray. It also adds more blond tones to your hair. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: happy45

customer_reviews.title: My favorite dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The best dry shampoo I’ve found for my hair, and I’ve tried a lot! Refreshes really well and gives me great volume without any sticky residue or “funk” in my hair. The scent is great too. I’ve been able to extend my hair several more days without washing since using this product. Also works great with helping to reshape my waves on days I don’t straighten.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I know better than to buy beauty products from a third party on Amazon however I failed to follow my own rule this time around and was burned - literally. The very first time I used this item the spray top popped off and the product sprayed everywhere. My bathroom walls and floor are covered in dry shampoo. The finger I used to push down the spray top is currently red and painful. The entire product emptied out in my bathtub. I will not be purchasing from this seller again, total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Sara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know If I’m using it wrong or what but it leaves a white residue in my hair, also the smell is extremely strong and over powering so I don’t like It. I’ve used this product one time and probably won’t use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Too expensive. Not effective.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my fine, blonde hair. This product’s WAY too overpriced and not nearly effective as the $3 dry shampoo Suave makes with the yellow lid. What in the world? The scent is fine but strong.
customer_reviews.author: TXlady

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry shampoo that I like. I also like how its white and will lighten my hair when it dirty. Gives me bright roots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this dry shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It smells heavenly and works awesome!! Makes my hair look and smell great!! Also makes my blonde hair look better. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: frankie zappo

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: Best freaking Dry shampoo EVER!! This may be a little on the pricey side but totally worth it! I have a super fine and super thin hair. This is the only dry shampoo that works for me!! Just remember less is best
customer_reviews.author: Cassie F

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: This bottle sprays out clear when usually this product has a purple tint to it, for blondes. It also smells terrible and Moroccanoil products are known for their fabulous smell. I am disappointed because I paid $26 for an item I cannot use or return (Amazon does not allow returns on flammable products). Don't waste your money and buy from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Simplifies My Mornings
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered the Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo multiple times. Originally, I ordered it on the recommendation from Our Time of the Month because I trust their judgement. In the past I’ve had a reaction to scented products, but I enjoy this one without any nasty side effects. The build up is minimal, and I can use it for at least three days between washes. It helps simplify my mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie by the Lake

customer_reviews.title: So great! Too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product! The smell is amazing! I would smell it randomly throughout the day and it just relaxes you. Very great product. Definitely worth buying. However, it’s expensive for the small can if you tend to use dry shampoo 4-5x a week.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has TWICE allowed me to go 7 days without washing my hair, and I actually got compliments on my dirty hair!! I really like it because it doesn’t have a strong scent, and it doesn’t leave a residue. Yes, it’s a little expensive, but it is worth the price. You won’t ever go back to cheap dry shampoo again.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling and dries up oil
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for blondes. My hair is fine and gets oily easily. This really dried up and brightens my roots so I don't have to wash my hair each day. I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this dry shampoo. She has blonde hair and goes 3-4 days without washing her hair and swears by this stuff. She has used just about every dry shampoo out there and since using this has not changed— I know because she has it on auto delivery and gets a new bottle every month!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tapley

customer_reviews.title: moraccaineoil dry shapoo for light color blonds
customer_reviews.text: never used a dry shampoo before. I adore it. Easy to use and after styling looks like you went to a professional
customer_reviews.author: ambjsgb

customer_reviews.title: this is the best for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: i have tried the cheap to the expensive range of dry shampoo, this one has worked the best for my fine, thine, blond hair.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: This Seller Is Selling Defective Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this dry shampoo but I’m very disappointed. When I received 2 bottles from this seller the light tones are non existent. So now I’m out $50 because of 2 bad bottles of this shampoo. Advice: find a different seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dry shampoo. A little goes a long way and lasts a couple days. I usually only wash my hair once a week and use this 3-4 days after washing and only use once before washing again. The scent is nice and the blonde color gives a little white/light color boost that fades as you brush through.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The only dry shampoo I can use. I’ve tried dozens and they all make my head itch. This is the ONLY one that has ever worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could afford it for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is seriously the best I’ve found. Smells good, leaves my hair soft and not weight down. I would buy this forever if only it isn’t 2+ times more expensive than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo has a nice fragrance and works well, does not make hair feel heavy or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy because can’t return if it’s defective!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the first time I’ve ordered this. My first order was perfect. I received my re-order on 2/18/2020. I just tried to use it but either the cab is empty or something is wrong with it. Nothing comes out but air. I tried to return it to purchase again but I was tol it’s not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Lori U

customer_reviews.title: Great dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this dry shampoo. I have used many brands and this one is one of favs. Smells great and works great. I always spray in and then brush my hair. Sometimes I use just to add a little more volume.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 different dry shampoos and this one is my favorite, isn't too heavy and doesn't leave a weird residue feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Works Wonderful! I have gone 4-5 days and not had to wash! My normal hair will get very oily the next day as I could fry an egg on my head greasy! I use this after the first day when hair is dry and only have to touch up slightly. LOVE this dry shampoo!!
customer_reviews.author: BECKY

customer_reviews.title: Scam and gross
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a scam. My hairdresser told me that the ones you get on amazon are a scam and not the real brand but I had already bought it so I decided to try. All it did was put white powder on my hair and then the feeling was simultaneously oily and chaulky. Buying off the website to see if it’s different like my hairdresser said.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: this is the best dry shampoo out there that I have tried and I have tried many many. This smells so good and makes my hair look like I just got my hair highlighted when it had been 5 months or longer. I always get a lot of compliments. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stanley

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like the smell.
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mentioned a great smell. I do not agree with them. I thought this smelled like old lady perfume. Smell is everything to me with a dry shampoo. I’ll stick to Amika brand.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find. Keeps hair fuller and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Amazing find. Keeps hair fuller and fresh. Saves an extra day of not washing and yet still have non greasy good hair day
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dry Shampoo for Platinum Blondes
customer_reviews.text: I am platinum blonde and I have struggled with finding a good dry shampoo. I didn’t want to use a white powder. This stuff is AMAZING. I’m in love with the scent. Sometimes I just spray it in my hair to make it smell good. It leaves the roots dry and almost gives them a lightness. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: kristina dedrich

customer_reviews.title: Took a recommendation from a stylist and I couldn't be happier! Does not leave any residue
customer_reviews.text: I have tried countless dry shampoos at a much higher price point... Took a recommendation from a stylist and I couldn't be happier! Does not leave any residue, smells great, and even adds volume.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover gray as much as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is really good dry shampoo but the light tones color does not cover my gray like I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for blondes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dry shampoo. Definitely only for blondes as it does lighten your roots, but the texture it creates in your hair is great and gives me a freshly blow dried look for another day.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee

customer_reviews.title: Not dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This is not dry shampoo. They send a dry texture spray which feels like concrete. Also, it’s not eligible for refund and they know that. Fair warning.
customer_reviews.author: JC

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Dry Shampoo Light Tones
product_meta.description:
Size:5.4 Fl OzMoroccanoil Dry Shampoo Light Tones is a dry cleansing spray that absorbs oil, product buildup and odor, instantly refreshing hair. Balances brassiness with subtle violet pigments, enhancing the appearance of light-colored hair. The UV-protecting, argan oil-infused formula contains ultra-fine rice starches that break down immediately after being massaged into the scalp—without leaving a dull residue. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes.

BRAND STORY
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
